com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl

Class DesktopMini2DxGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.DesktopMini2DxGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Application

    public class DesktopMini2DxGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Application
    Launches desktop-based mini2Dx games. Based on LibGDX's LwjglApplication class
